name: novu
description: Novu is an open-source notification platform that enables managing and sending notifications across channels like email, SMS, chat, and push. It includes templates, workflows, logs, and supports self-hosting or cloud.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send messages via email, SMS, push, in-app, and chat from one platform

features.title: Workflow Builder
features.description: Design notification flows with triggers, delays, and conditional logic

features.title: Template Management
features.description: Create reusable notification templates with variables and localization

features.title: Subscriber Management
features.description: Organize users with preferences, topics, and segmentation

features.title: Notification Center
features.description: Embed in-app notification feeds in your applications with SDK
